alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 7:55AM MST until January 14 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 13 inches, except 8 to 20 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Bear River Range, including but not limited to Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
